system.biography:
TitleFFF 802b Gargu-Hyeka Queen
Birthday15 Morgat 699
AppearanceAge 20, height 3’7”, massive frame (size 6), weight 162 lb, pallid complexion, brown hair, dark brown eyes
Medical/PsycheObesity/Pvaraphobia (Moderate, test against WIL×3 or flee from obvious magical effects).
Size0
Armor
Other EquipmentBone and stone chip necklace
ValuablesRing (see note below for Eye of Lothrim)
NotesSkill MLs have been adjusted to account for gravid obesity. The Eye of Lothrim allows the wearer to intimidate gargun. For details, see the Eye of Lothrim artifact article.

Biography

Umaka is a Gargu-hyeka who has been queen of her hive for most of her life. She became queen after being repeatedly raped by the Hyeka king shortly after she became sexually mature at the age of 2. As a runt among the princesses, her sisters had thrown her to the lustful king to escape the fate of queendom. Umaka never forgot nor forgave this betrayal.

Most foulspawn queens are resigned to their fate of being turned into corpulent, perpetually pregnant beings that surrender their bodies to sexually gratify whatever males happen to murder their predecessors for kingship. Umaka has not only embraced this fate, but has used her impressive intellect, cunning, and guile to rule the hive even as kings come and go. It was the accidental acquisition of an ancient magical treasure, however, that cemented Umaka’s undisputed rule over the hive. She found a curious ring (see Eye of Lothrim artifact article) while rummaging through ancient layers of detritus excavated out of part of the Queen’s chamber. Although she does not exactly understand how it works, she has come to realize its benefits. She relishes it and dominates the hive through its power.

Umaka actively encourages competition for her sexual favors, using male slaves to deliver bribes and promises to entice males to wage duels and murder. She inflicts vindictive, petty tasks on her princesses and routinely arranges for their deaths through accidents, fights, or poison. Such is Umaka’s vanity and spite that she will even arrange for a swarm to remove particularly troublesome princesses, relishing in the bloodbath as her children engage in wholesale butchery.

HOOKS

A Spider in the Web. Umaka has grown tired of the current king and wishes him replaced. She sends a princess to find humans (the PCs) who might be induced via bribes to assassinate the powerful king while he is out hunting with his warriors.

Legacy of Lothrim. A Fyvrian mage (Mabresen, see FFF) has learned through research and divination that Umaka holds the Eye of Lothrim. He hires the PCs to steal the ring for him. Umaka will not be inclined to give it up.

A Dinner Invitation. Umaka despises the company of her princesses and regularly orders the king to capture some humans for her entertainment. These unfortunates (the PCs) must cater to her vanity and pride to avoid the roasting pit while trying to find a means to escape the hive. Woe to any human (male or female) that Umaka chooses to sate her debased lusts.

Credits

This character is taken from “Friends, Foes, and Followers, Part 13” on Lythia.com (https://www.lythia.com/game_aides/fff-gargu/), by Shawn Bond, with illustrations by Richard Luscheck, and is “fanon”, a derivative work of copyrighted material by Columbia Games Inc. and N. Robin Crossby.
